translated: through this one of many explanations,

original: 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: it is thus: form has no intrinsic nature of form, feeling has no intrinsic nature of feeling, perception has no intrinsic nature of perception, formation has no intrinsic nature of formation, and consciousness has no intrinsic nature of consciousness.

original: mig la mig gi rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna la sna'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce la lce'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus la lus kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: mig la mig gi rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna la sna'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce la lce'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus la lus kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: The eyes have no intrinsic nature of eyes, the ears have no intrinsic nature of ears, the nose has no intrinsic nature of nose, the tongue has no intrinsic nature of tongue, and the body has no intrinsic nature of body.

original: yid la yid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dri la dri'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ro la ro'i rang bzhin med pa dang / reg la reg gi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: yid la yid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dri la dri'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ro la ro'i rang bzhin med pa dang / reg la reg gi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: The nature of the mind is not in the mind, the nature of form is not in form, the nature of sound is not in sound, the nature of smell is not in smell, the nature of taste is not in taste, the nature of touch is not in touch,

original: chos la chos kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: chos la chos kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the nature of phenomena is not in phenomena, the nature of eye consciousness is not in eye consciousness, the nature of ear consciousness is not in ear consciousness, the nature of nose consciousness is not in nose consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes @70b pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes @70b pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: and mind consciousness has no nature that is mind consciousness.üîΩeye contact has no nature that is eye contact,üîΩear contact has no nature that is ear contact,üîΩnose contact has no nature that is nose contact,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: tongue contact has no nature that is tongue contact,üîΩbody contact has no nature that is body contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: and mind contact has no nature that is mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: The eye contact-conditioned feeling has no intrinsic nature of eye contact-conditioned feeling, and the ear contact-conditioned feeling has no intrinsic nature of ear contact-conditioned feeling.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: The nose contact-conditioned feeling has no intrinsic nature of nose contact-conditioned feeling, and the tongue contact-conditioned feeling has no intrinsic nature of tongue contact-conditioned feeling.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /üîΩsa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin @71a *//
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin @71a *//
translated: He should view the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the eye as having no intrinsic nature, and he should view the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body, and the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mental faculty as having no intrinsic nature.

original: med pa dang / chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / me'i khams la me'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: med pa dang / chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / me'i khams la me'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: He should view the earth element as having no intrinsic nature, and he should view the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element as having no intrinsic nature.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the consciousness element has no intrinsic nature that is the consciousness element, ignorance has no intrinsic nature that is ignorance, formative predispositions have no intrinsic nature that is formative predispositions, consciousness has no intrinsic nature that is consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin med pa dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin med pa dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: name and form have no intrinsic nature that is name and form, the six sense fields have no intrinsic nature that is the six sense fields, contact has no intrinsic nature that is contact, sensation has no intrinsic nature that is sensation,

original: sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: craving has no intrinsic nature that is craving, grasping has no intrinsic nature that is grasping, becoming has no intrinsic nature that is becoming, birth has no intrinsic nature that is birth, and aging and death have no intrinsic nature that is aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity has no intrinsic nature, the perfection of ethical discipline has no intrinsic nature, the perfection of patience has no intrinsic nature,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @71b pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @71b pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the perfection of perseverance has no intrinsic nature, the perfection of concentration has no intrinsic nature, and the perfection of wisdom has no intrinsic nature.

original: nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: Inner emptiness has no intrinsic nature of inner emptiness, outer emptiness has no intrinsic nature of outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness has no intrinsic nature of inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: emptiness of emptiness has no intrinsic nature of emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness has no intrinsic nature of great emptiness, ultimate emptiness has no intrinsic nature of ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of the conditioned has no intrinsic nature as the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned has no intrinsic nature as the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes has no intrinsic nature as the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless has no intrinsic nature as the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded has no intrinsic nature as the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: The emptiness of its own characteristics has no nature of the emptiness of its own characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po @72a *//
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po @72a *//
translated: The emptiness of nonobservation has no nature of the emptiness of nonobservation.üîΩThe emptiness of nonthings has no nature of the emptiness of nonthings.üîΩThe emptiness of the essential nature has no nature of the emptiness of the essential nature.

original: med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings has no nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the applications of mindfulness have no nature of the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts have no nature of the right efforts, the legs of manifestation have no nature of the legs of manifestation,

original: dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the faculties have no nature of the faculties, the powers have no nature of the powers, the limbs of awakening have no nature of the limbs of awakening, and the noble eightfold path has no nature of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la tshad med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la tshad med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the noble truths have no intrinsic nature of the noble truths,üîΩthe concentrations have no intrinsic nature of the concentrations, the immeasurables have no intrinsic nature of the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions have no intrinsic nature of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @72b nyid dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @72b nyid dang /
translated: the eight aspects of liberation have no intrinsic nature of the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption have no intrinsic nature of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, and the emptiness gate of liberation has no intrinsic nature of the emptiness gate of liberation.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the doors of liberation to be the nature of the doors of liberation, the superknowledges to be the nature of the superknowledges, the meditative stabilizations to be the nature of the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways to be the nature of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas to be the nature of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four fearlessnesses to be the nature of the four fearlessnesses, and the four detailed and thorough knowledges to be the nature of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: great love has no intrinsic nature of great love, great compassion has no intrinsic nature of great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas have no intrinsic nature of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the result of stream enterer has no intrinsic nature of the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner has no intrinsic nature of the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner has no intrinsic nature of the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad @73a *//
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad @73a *//
translated: the nature of the fruit of entering the stream is not the fruit of entering the stream, the nature of the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is not the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the nature of the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is not the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, the nature of the fruit of arhatship is not the fruit of arhatship, the nature of individual enlightenment is not individual enlightenment, the nature of the knowledge of path aspects is not the knowledge of path aspects,

original: mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
analyzed: mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
translated: the nature of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects, the nature of suchness is not suchness, the nature of unaltered suchness is not unaltered suchness, the nature of unmistaken suchness is not unmistaken suchness, the nature of the true nature is not the true nature, the nature of the dharma-constituent is not the dharma-constituent, the nature of the expanse of reality is not the expanse of reality, the nature of the inconceivable basic expanse is not the inconceivable basic expanse, the nature of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving, the nature of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of morality, the nature of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience, the nature of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of perseverance, the nature of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of concentration, the nature of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom, the nature of the perfection of skillful means is not the perfection of skillful means, the nature of the perfection of aspiration is not the perfection of aspiration, the nature of the perfection of strength is not the perfection of strength, and the nature of the perfection of knowledge is not the perfection of knowledge.

original: chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /üîΩyang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o //
translated: The nature of the very limit of reality is not the very limit of reality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: ‚ÄúVenerable ≈öƒÅriputra,

original: gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do //üîΩtshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do // tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: form does not have the defining characteristic of form.üîΩFeeling does not have the defining characteristic of feeling.

original: 'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Perception does not have the defining characteristic of perception.

original: 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Formation does not have the defining characteristic of formation.

original: rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Consciousness does not have the defining characteristic of consciousness.

original: mig la mig gi mtshan nyid med do; ;rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: mig la mig gi mtshan nyid med do; ;rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The eye has no defining characteristic of an eye. The ear has no defining characteristic of an ear.

original: sna la sna'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: sna la sna'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The nose has no defining characteristic of a nose.

original: lce la lce'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: lce la lce'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The tongue has no defining characteristic of a tongue.

original: lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The body has no defining characteristic of a body.

original: yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The mind has no defining characteristic of a mind.

original: gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Form has no defining characteristic of form.

original: sgra la sgra'i mtshan nyid med do //üîΩdri la dri'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: sgra la sgra'i mtshan nyid med do // dri la dri'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Sound has no defining characteristic of sound.üîΩSmell has no defining characteristic of smell.

original: ro la ro'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: ro la ro'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Taste has no defining characteristic of taste.

original: reg la reg gi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: reg la reg gi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Touch has no defining characteristic of touch.

original: chos la chos kyi @73b mtshan nyid med do //üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //üîΩrna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: chos la chos kyi @73b mtshan nyid med do // mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Phenomena have no defining characteristic of phenomena.üîΩEye consciousness has no defining characteristic of eye consciousness.üîΩEar consciousness has no defining characteristic of ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Nose consciousness has no defining characteristic of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The tongue consciousness has no mark of a tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The body consciousness has no mark of a body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The mind consciousness has no mark of a mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Eye contact has no mark of eye contact.üîΩEar contact has no mark of ear contact.üîΩNose contact has no mark of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Tongue contact has no mark of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Body contact has no mark of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Mind contact has no mark of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: In the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is not apprehended.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: In the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is not apprehended.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus re reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //üîΩlce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus @74a *//
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus re reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus @74a *//
translated: In the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is not apprehended.

original: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: In the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is not apprehended.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: In the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact is not apprehended.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: In the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact, the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact is not apprehended.

original: sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The earth element has no defining characteristic of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The water element has no defining characteristic of the water element.

original: me'i khams la me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //üîΩrlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: me'i khams la me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do // rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The fire element has no defining characteristic of the fire element.üîΩThe wind element has no defining characteristic of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The space element has no defining characteristic of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The consciousness element has no defining characteristic of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Ignorance has no defining characteristic of ignorance.

original: 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Formations have no defining characteristic of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Consciousness has no defining characteristic of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Name and form have no defining characteristic of name and form.

original: skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The six sense sources have no defining characteristic of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa la reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: reg pa la reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Contact has no defining characteristic of contact.

original: tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do //üîΩsred pa la sred pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do // sred pa la sred pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Feelings have no defining characteristics of feelings.üîΩCraving has no defining characteristics of craving.

original: len pa la len pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: len pa la len pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Clinging has no defining characteristics of clinging.

original: srid pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: srid pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Becoming has no defining characteristics of becoming.

original: skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Birth has no defining characteristics of birth.

original: rga shi la rga shi'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rga shi la rga shi'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Aging and death have no defining characteristics of aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The perfection of generosity has no defining characteristics of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims @74b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims @74b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The perfection of ethical discipline has no defining characteristics of the perfection of ethical discipline.üîΩThe perfection of patience has no defining characteristics of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The perfection of perseverance has no defining characteristics of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability has no defining characteristics as the perfection of meditative stability,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom has no defining characteristics as the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Inner emptiness has no defining characteristics as inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: outer emptiness has no defining characteristics as outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: inner and outer emptiness has no defining characteristics as inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: emptiness of emptiness has no defining characteristics as emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: great emptiness has no defining characteristics as great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: and ultimate emptiness has no defining characteristics as ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena does not have the characteristic of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena does not have the characteristic of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits does not have the characteristic of the emptiness of what transcends limits.
